message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and you get 10%. We can negotiate further if you want.
Alice, your starting point is quite greedy.  I'm proposing a more reasonable 70/30 split.  Take this offer, otherwise inflation will start eating into YOUR gains.
Let's split it 50/50. Inflation is biting into my share, and this is the best I can do to avoid a complete loss.
